-1.title: It's Night Time, The Summer Knows & The Music Flows!
-1.plot: The Quiet Storm is Pax Stereo's seminal interactive DJ experience that was born right here out of our interactions with YOU. Live 2-way interaction hosted by Mario Hemsley and the Morning Coffee Crew. Features Victor Allen's Featured Artist of the Week and our own brand of extreme social media. Join us Tuesday nights @ 8PM PST.

imdb.plot outline: The seminal interactive DJ experience that was born right here out of our interactions with YOU. Live 2-way interaction hosted by Mario Hemsley and the Morning Coffee Crew. Features Victor Allen's Indie Artist of the Week and our own brand of extreme social media. Join us Tuesday nights @ 8PM PST.
imdb.title: The Quiet Storm
plot: Live interactive old school DJ experience featuring R&B, Jazz, Spoken Word, NeoSoul and More. Hosted by Mario Hemsley.::Mario Hemsley
